cancelTransaction.title: Cancel transaction
cancelTransaction.subtitle: Are you sure want to cancel this transaction? Only new and pending transactions can be cancelled. You will not be charged for any gas if cancelled.

hashConfirmation.title: Hash Confirmation
hashConfirmation.subtitle: Your transaction has been submitted! You can view its status in your History, but we recommend Etherscan for the most up to date information.

batchConfirmation.title: Batch Confirmation
batchConfirmation.subtitle: Your transaction has been queued for batching! You can view its status, update the priority, and cancel it entirely from your Dashboard or History.

connect.body: Do not close this window while connecting. Have a question? Follow this guide.
